description: Hoang Su Phi is a rural district of Ha Giang province in the northeastern region of Vietnam. While Dong Van Karst Geo-park makes Ha Giang a bigger name for visitors from far and wide by the grey limestone mountains, Hoang Su Phi offers visitors a different taste with stunning rice terraces. The highlights and must-see places for the terraces are near and along the main road between Hoang Su Phi and Xin Man, where those terraces are classified as a National Heritage by the Vietnamese Government.To landscape photographers, Hoang Su Phi is a great choice. Known for the deep valleys and unique edaphological character, Hoang Su Phi not only brings good harvests for locals but also offers a splendid attraction for tourists.
